name: CrmPackageDeployerTask
description: Package deployer deployment using embeded powershell scripts.
author: capgemini-uk

inputs.name: workingDir
inputs.label: PackageDeployer Working Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The PackageDeployer Working Directory, should contain 'PackageDeployer.exe' and the 'PkgFolder' folder.

inputs.name: packageName
inputs.label: Custom PackageDeployer .dll Filename
inputs.helpMarkDown: The filename of the .dll compiled from the PackageDeployer project.

inputs.name: connectionString
inputs.label: Connection String
inputs.helpMarkDown: ConnectionString to Dynamics 365 instance. [Microsoft Connection String Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/customer-engagement/developer/xrm-tooling/use-connection-strings-xrm-tooling-connect#create-a-connection-string)

inputs.name: logOutputFolder
inputs.label: Log output directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The directory that the logs produced will be outputted to.

inputs.name: configSubfolder
inputs.label: Data Import Config Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the config file for the Capgemini.Xrm.DataMigration data import files. Leave empty if not being used.

inputs.name: syncTimeoutMinutes
inputs.label: Synchronous Operation TimeOut
inputs.helpMarkDown: The timeout for a single synchronous operation in minutes.
